entities.c: STATUS: Herald-trainee officially; quartered at Healer's cottage in Companion's Field for safety. COMMITMENT: Maintaining discretion about Mage-Gift. GIFT: Confirmed Mage-Gift—energy blast leveled Lisle; first manifestation in generations since Vanyel; no living teachers available.

STATE: Recovering from complete mind-merge with Rance under Healer Crescent's care; profoundly overwhelmed but unharmed; worked through buried trauma during merge—decades of self-doubt, fear of Empathy consuming identity, isolation from carrying kingdom's burdens alone; left in better emotional state than before despite overwhelm. SHARED: Rance now possesses her complete life—escape from Sensholding, Rolan's Choosing, Empathy awakening, every state secret, all training, wine preferences (47 vintage), every private moment. STANCE-Rance: Intimate knowledge shared both ways; he saw her deepest vulnerabilities; complicated mix of violation/gratitude/fascination; their passionate kiss closed the connection; uncertain how relationship will proceed.

REALIZATION: Rance has raw wild Mage-Gift—kind not seen since Vanyel's time; understands he rewrote magical theory within days of Choosing. STANCE-Rance: Protective during Circle meeting; proud of his practical leadership; concerned about political tightrope; dry humor about expecting complications but not this scale; steady anchor through extraordinary events; accepts their life won't be dull Circuit routes.

REACTION: Initial composure cracked at confirmation of Mage-Gift and complete mind-merge; Rance casually demonstrated Talia's intimate knowledge (wine preferences) proving claim; processing that untrained man now possesses all kingdom's sensitive information; approved Healer's cottage quarantine; ordered information sealed to Circle only; grateful for warning about Karse. CONCERN: Security vulnerability of two people with Queen's Own knowledge; political implications; whether Talia recovers full capabilities.

STANCE-Rance: Stood beside him throughout Circle meeting without Talia present—deliberate endorsement; silent legitimization of extraordinary claims; assessed situation with grave concern tempered by hope; presence reassured skeptical Circle members; his approval carries weight beyond words.

ASSESSMENT: Confirmed Karsite special forces—recent issue, official sanction not rogues; prisoners taken alive suggests purposeful action. STANCE-Rance: Tested then respected after Rance proved not extremist Vkandis worshipper; pragmatic focus on training, containment, protection needs; noted security concerns of two with Queen's Own knowledge.
IDENTITY: Lord Marshal's Herald; military bearing. TASKED: Making discreet inquiries to Rethwellan, Hardorn, Menmellith about Karsite activity on their borders.
IDENTITY: Chronicler; severe-looking; knowledgeable about cyclical Karsite extremism. TASKED: Searching archives for sealed records from Vanyel's time regarding Mage-Gift training.

ASSESSMENT: Complete mind-merge should have killed them both or driven them insane; shocked Rance casually dismissed catastrophic event; reluctantly cleared both as physically stable despite impossibility. TASKED: Caring for Talia; observing both afterward.

KNOWLEDGE: Sealed information—Rance has Mage-Gift (first since Vanyel); complete mind-merge with Talia giving him all state secrets; Karsite blood magic suspected; live captives taken from Lisle. DECISION: Information contained to Circle only; Rance officially just Herald-trainee; quartered at Healer's cottage; investigations into Karsite activity across all borders; will debate political ramifications privately.

Rance confirmed as Herald-Mage; raw wild power capable of leveling villages when untrained; true Mage-Gift allows reshaping reality itself; archives may contain sealed training records from Vanyel's era; return coinciding with Karsite blood magic noted as unlikely to be coincidental.

Complete memory-merge between Rance and Talia—full bidirectional sharing of entire lives; functionally impossible without decades of training; should have killed both or driven them insane; unprecedented in all Valdemaran records; Rance used untrained Mage-Gift to stabilize Talia and guide separation; closed connection with passionate kiss; creates security vulnerability—two people now possess Queen's Own's complete knowledge.

Sun-Priests suspected of returning to human sacrifice and blood magic—possibly demon summoning; shows cyclical returns during internal instability; live captives needed for fresh sacrifice (more power); special forces with military-grade weapons took villagers alive including young and elderly; represents fundamental policy shift if confirmed; attacking across Valdemar border—unknown if other nations targeted.

Old cottage in Companion's Field; chosen as Rance's quarters; remote enough to not level Collegium during magical incidents; close enough to not be isolated; allows discreet meetings; official reason for separate housing unspecified—rumor mill will generate competing theories naturally.
Rance reported Lisle attack to Circle; Karsite blood magic suspected
